name: Entirely Normal Snake Game
description:
My submission for the Raylib 9 years game jam with the theme: unexpected!

It's just a snake game, nothing unexpected here at all...

- Arrow keys to move

- Eat the apples

(Horrendously disorganized and inefficient) source code: TheManTheMythTheGameDev/rl9YearsGameJam (github.com)

A note on some of the glitches:

I really couldn't tell you why, but the game is significantly glitchier on web than on desktop. I may try to fix these bugs later on, but this is the version I am submitting to the jam. Have fun!
